body.p: In this section, the Layout Summary Report is generated with the layers statistics to compare the layouts.

ol.li: From the Layout menu, select File > Summary.

The Design Summary window displays; select only the Basic Summary option, and then click OK. Design Summary window
The Summary window for the design displays and shows the Layout Objects Statistics (), which shows the total shapes present in the layout. Design Summary
To save the Summary file, select File > Save As, and then give the name layout_extract.summary.

body.p: Next, you stream a GDS file into a Layout view and compare the layout with the previously available Summary report.

ol.li: From the Cadence Virtuoso* CIW, select File > Import > Streamâ€¦ The XStream In form displays (Figure 70).
Specify names in the Library, Top Cell, and View regions for the GDS file stream-in. XStream In form
When the stream-in completes, the following message displays (): Stream in translation complete notification
Click No, and then click Cancel in the XStream In form.

body.p: In the Library Manager, verify the newly generated layout view is available.

ol.li: Open the Lib/Cell/View: ldk_demo_lib / i0mbfn000aa1d48x5 / layout_streamin
From the Layout menu, select File > Summary.
In the Design Summary window, select only Basic Summary. The Summary window displays (). Summary window

li.p: Click File > Save As to save the Summary file. Name the file: layout_streamin.summary.
In the layout_streamin summary report, 1177 shapes are present; in the layout_extract summary report, 1221 shares are present.
In the layout_extract, ndealign (22 dot shapes) and pdealign (22 dot shapes) are present only for id purposes. These are ignored in the layermap file and have (0 0) data type value for GDS.
